sliderText1: Turkey's most reliable villa rental portal
searchAmongHundredsofVillasText: We have gathered the best villas in the Aegean and Mediterranean regions. Search among hundreds of villas according to your needs and choose the most suitable one for you.
sendRequestText: Examine all the features of the villa you choose and send a request for the dates you set.
completeReservationText: Easily complete your reservation for an unforgettable holiday experience with your loved ones.
ourVillasText: We have selected the most exclusive ones for you among our villas.
ourApartmentsText: We have selected the most exclusive ones for you among our apartments.
carRentalText: Make your time in our region much more comfortable and of higher quality with our car rental service. Easily rent the vehicles that best suit your usage habits, needs, and budget. Enjoy all the natural, historical, and cultural beauties with the comfort of your private car.
ourVillasForSaleText: We have gathered the most beautiful and unique villas for sale in Muğla, Fethiye, and its surroundings for you. You can review the alternatives, see the villas for sale that best suit your needs and budget, and make your choice. On our page, you can find villas located in the most beautiful regions of our country, decorated uniquely, perfect for accommodation, vacationing, or commercial use. Choose according to your budget with a wide price range.
indexBlogSubText: You can get information about our region from our blogs
rentOutYourVillaText: If you want to rent out your villas or summerhouses through a professional company, earn income, host new people, and receive services from a professional company, you can contact us.
specialFoodBasketForYouText: If you want to have a basket filled with high-quality and safe food that will delight your taste buds and hearts during your honeymoon or holiday, you can contact us and have the most suitable food basket prepared for you and your loved ones.
contactErrorMessage: Your request has not reached us
name: Name
blogsListed: A total of {{blogCount}} blogs have been listed
regionsListed: A total of {{regionCount}} regions have been listed
thereAreFacilities: A total of {{facilityCount}} facilities are available
thisFieldCannotBeLeftBlank: This field cannot be left blank
pleaseEnterAValidPhoneNumber: Please enter a valid phone number
pricesMayVaryOnSpecialDays: Prices may vary on special days (Holidays, New Year, etc.)
weAreWaitingForYourComment: We are waiting for your comment
facilityNotAvailableMessage: Our facility is not available for the selected dates
facilityNotAvailablePleaseCheckCalender: The villa is not available for the selected dates. Please check the availability calendar of the villa.
paymentByCreditCardMessage: I want to make the payment for this reservation by credit card
paymentByMoneyOrderMessage: I want to make the payment for this reservation by bank transfer
completeReservationStep2Text: When you send your reservation request, the dates for the relevant facility are closed as optional. In this way, you have reserved your place for your holiday. Our customer representative will contact you and finalize your reservation.
createdReservationMessage: Your Reservation Order Has Been Received
createdReservationDesc: {{villaName}} has been reserved for you for the dates {{entryDate}} to {{exitDate}}. Our customer representative will contact you shortly to finalize your reservation. Thank you for choosing us.
ourViewsSubTitle: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit
foodPackage1Message: Everything we tried with John was delicious
faqFırstItemDesc: This page includes frequently asked questions and answers about our services. You can always contact our call center for any other questions you may have.
activitesListed: A total of {{activiteCount}} activites have been listed
